articles.author: Milana Vinn, Steven Scheer
articles.title: Google parent in talks to buy cybersecurity startup Wiz for $23 billion - Reuters
articles.description: Google parent Alphabet is in advanced talks to acquire cybersecurity startup Wiz for roughly $23 billion, a person familiar with the matter said on Sunday, in a deal that would represent the technology giant's biggest acquisition ever.
